tool_description: Creates chronological timelines showing the evolution of words through different historical periods with associated dates, forms, and linguistic contexts.

word_data.description: Array of etymological data entries from Word Origin Finder

include_uncertainties.description: Include uncertain or disputed dating information

error_messages: Invalid period specification: Use recognizable historical periods or date formats (BCE/CE, linguistic periods like 'Old English', or approximate dates).
Insufficient data: Provide at least one etymological data entry in word_data array.
Period order error: Ensure start_period comes chronologically before end_period.
Unsupported granularity: Use 'century', 'decade', or 'linguistic_period' for granularity parameter.
usage: Input etymological data from Word Origin Finder along with desired time range and granularity. The tool constructs a chronological timeline showing word evolution across specified periods.

timeline_periods.description: Chronologically ordered list of time periods

word_forms.description: Word forms corresponding to each timeline period

certainty_markers.description: Confidence indicators for each period: confirmed, probable, speculative

timeline_summary.description: Overview of the word's evolution across the specified timeframe
